column.name: translation_text
column.value: Bu soruya yanıt verilmesi gerekiyor.

update.where: validation_type_id = (select validation_type_id from validation_type where validation_type_code = 'REQUIRED') and language_code_id = (select language_code_id from language_code where iso_language_code = 'tr')

column.name: translation_text
column.value: Yıl alanı gereklidir.

update.where: validation_type_id = (select validation_type_id from validation_type where validation_type_code = 'YEAR_REQUIRED') and language_code_id = (select language_code_id from language_code where iso_language_code = 'tr')

column.name: translation_text
column.value: Seçilen tarih, tarih aralığı içinde olmalıdır.

update.where: validation_type_id = (select validation_type_id from validation_type where validation_type_code = 'DATE_RANGE') and language_code_id = (select language_code_id from language_code where iso_language_code = 'tr')

column.name: translation_text
column.value: Sorunun tamamen doldurulması gerekir.

update.where: validation_type_id = (select validation_type_id from validation_type where validation_type_code = 'COMPLETE') and language_code_id = (select language_code_id from language_code where iso_language_code = 'tr')

column.name: translation_text
column.value: Yaş, belirtilen değerler arasında olmalıdır.

update.where: validation_type_id = (select validation_type_id from validation_type where validation_type_code = 'AGE_RANGE') and language_code_id = (select language_code_id from language_code where iso_language_code = 'tr')

column.name: translation_text
column.value: Minimum veya maksimum sayı şartı sağlanmıyor.

update.where: validation_type_id = (select validation_type_id from validation_type where validation_type_code = 'INT_RANGE') and language_code_id = (select language_code_id from language_code where iso_language_code = 'tr')
